nodes.text: The Lorell Route was a hyperlane mostly within the Lorelli Reach and the Rifle Worlds of the Hapes Cluster. It started at the Lorell system then connected with the Andalia system, after which there was a junction that connected with the Chosper and Sennex star systems. From the Sennex system, the hyperspace lane continued through the Daruvvia system, the Ket system, the Lovola system, and the Maires system to the Vergill system, where it ended.
